Name: NPK (26-15-15) fertiliser production | NPK (26-15-15) fertiliser | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
Description: This datasets corresponds to the technology used in North American fertiliser plants. The production of NPK involves the combination of rock phosphate with a large amount of nitric acid, ammonia, potassium chloride, ammonium phosphate, using heat and electricity.
